# Preface

This guide was made for the purposes of showcasing the various ways the lab has 
implemented various experimental procedures, as well as various lab management tasks and
administrative related duties at the University of Mississippi Medical Center in Jackson, MS.

The chapters in this book are meant to simply be a reference point for completing tasks.  If you find
a mistake, then please let someone know or edit it yourself on GitHub.  Feel free to add your own
chapter or section using [bookdown](https://bookdown.org/) via RStudio.
